{{userQuestion.thequestion}}
import {Component, Injectable, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import {Router} from "@angular/router"; import {HttpClient} from "@angular/common/http"; import {Observable} from "rxjs"; import {QuestionService} from "../../../question.service"; @Injectable({ providedIn: 'root' }) @Component({ selector: 'app-first-question', templateUrl: './first-question.component.html', styleUrls: ['./first-question.component.css'] }) export class FirstQuestionComponent implements OnInit { userQuestions:any; ngOnInit() { this.http.get('http://localhost:8080/UserQuestion').subscribe((data) => { console.log(data); // You can check the data in the browser console // Assign the data to a variable to display it in the template this.userQuestions = data; }); } constructor(private http: HttpClient) { } }
